sen2r 0.3.3
  • Home
  • Function reference

Reference

Automatic processing chain

sen2r()

Find, download and preprocess Sentinel-2 images

Find and download Sentinel-2 products

s2_list()

Retrieve list of available products.

s2_download()

Download S2 products.

sen2cor()

Correct L1C products using sen2cor

Read and convert SAFE format

s2_translate()

Convert from SAFE format

s2_merge()

Merge S2 tiles with the same date and orbit

gdal_warp()

Clip, reproject and warp raster files

s2_mask() s2_perc_masked()

Apply cloud masks

s2_rgb()

Create RGB images from S2 reflectance products.

s2_calcindices()

Compute maps of spectral indices

s2_thumbnails()

Create thumbnails for S2 products.

Manage file names and metadata

safe_getMetadata() rm_invalid_safe() safe_isvalid()

Get information from S2 file name or metadata

safe_shortname()

Rename products using a shorten convention

sen2r_getElements()

Get information from S2 short name

s2_dop()

Return the Dates Of Passage over some orbits

s2_tiles()

Load Sentinel-2 tiles

Install and configure dependencies

check_sen2r_deps()

Check package dependencies

load_binpaths()

Load the paths of external executables

install_sen2cor()

Download and install sen2cor.

install_wget()

Download and install wget.

install_aria2()

Download and install aria2.

init_python()

Initialise python

Accessory functions

s2_gui()

Launch the GUI for Sentinel-2 products

list_indices()

List spectral indices

stack2rgb()

Produce an RGB image from a multiband raster file.

raster2rgb()

Produce an RGB image from a singleband raster file.

expand_path()

Expand a path with a parent directory

comsub()

Find the longest common starting substring or directory

projpar() projname()

Return a parameter used in a WRT projection

abs2rel()

Convert a path to a relative path

gdal_abs2rel() gdal_rel2abs()

Convert absolute from/to relative paths in a virtual file

mountpoint()

Return the mountpoint of the input directory (if it is mounted)

start_trace() end_trace() clean_trace() trace_function() clean_traces()

Trace functions which create files

st_crs2()

Retrieve coordinate reference system from sf or sfc object

normalize_path()

Express file paths in canonical Form basing on the operating system

smooth_mask()

Buffer clound masks

Internal functions

(not exported)

nn()

Replace NULL with character()

geograbber_process()

Preprocess (clip, reproject, reshape, mask) SAFE products

import_s2download()

Import s2download python module

print_message()

Print a message

create_indices_db()

Create the indices database

gdal_formats_db()

Create the database of GDAL supported formats

editModPoly()

Shiny Module Server for Geo Create, Edit, Delete

read_scihub_login() write_scihub_login() scihub_modal()

Import / export SciHub username and password

check_param_list()

Check a parameter list

s2_defNA()

Set NA value of a specific product type

compute_s2_paths() list_sen2r_paths()

Compute names of S2 file to be generated

maskapply_parallel()

Parallel masking over SR products

load_extent_bbox() load_extent_vectfile() load_extent_draw()

Insert an extent

get_spatype()

check the "spatial type" of an object or file

get_rastype()

Check in the input is a Raster object or raster file

get_vectype()

check the "spatial type" of an object or file

create_s2_dop()

Create the database of S2 orbits and doy of passage
